org.afree.chart.title

Class LegendGraphic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.afree.chart.block.AbstractBlock
      • org.afree.chart.title.LegendGraphic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Block, Drawable, PublicCloneable

    public class LegendGraphic
extends AbstractBlock
implements Block, PublicCloneable
    The graphical item within a legend item.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LegendGraphic(Shape shape, PaintType fillPaintType)
      Creates a new legend graphic.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Size2D arrange(Canvas canvas, RectangleConstraint constraint)
      Arranges the contents of the block, within the given constraints, and returns the block size.
      protected Size2D arrangeNN(Canvas canvas)
      Performs the layout with no constraint, so the content size is determined by the bounds of the shape and/or line drawn to represent the series.

      Returns a clone of this LegendGraphic instance.

      • arrange

        public Size2D arrange(Canvas canvas,
             RectangleConstraint constraint)
        Arranges the contents of the block, within the given constraints, and returns the block size.
        Specified by:
        arrange in interface Block
        Overrides:
        arrange in class AbstractBlock
        Parameters:
        canvas - the graphics device.
        constraint - the constraint (null not permitted).
        Returns:
        The block size (in Canvas units, never null).

      • arrangeNN

        protected Size2D arrangeNN(Canvas canvas)
        Performs the layout with no constraint, so the content size is determined by the bounds of the shape and/or line drawn to represent the series.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the graphics device.
        Returns:
        The content size.
